name: Road Constructor
description:
You are the main architect for a soon to be constructed road, you must design the optimal road for this project. Play around with each piece of road to reach every corner and gather bonus roads along the way!

Gameplay:
  • Click and drag to swap pieces
  • Right click a piece to rotate the piece clockwise
  • Click the start piece (the road with the circle) to submit your road construction.
  • Road pieces ending in squares can occur in the later stages of the game, these grant bonus points, so be sure to include them in your construction!
Development status:

The game is currently still in development, and pieces may be altered and new pieces may be added. 

The difficulty curve and the time for each level is still being tweaked.

Road pieces for each level is still being optimized as to avoid the possible "un-win-able"  scenario. All pieces are equally likely to occur, and as such a level with no solution for the "perfect" score may occur.
